section.p: Contains the response to an non surgical occurrence assessment question requiring a textual answer.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] resultText with data type String
Contains the response to an non surgical occurrence assessment question requiring a textual answer.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
uniquely identifies the intraoperative occurrence.

Contains exactly one [1..1] occurenceCode with data type Code
Code indicating the question asked as part of the non surgical occurrence assessment performed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] resultText with data type String
Contains the response to an non surgical occurrence assessment question requiring a textual answer.
